answers.answer: Yes I see my OB and my MFM both once a week

Me, I go once a week and to ultrasound, and I'm gonna be 17 weeks tomorrow, I like it thou, I had and lost last year at 17 weeks so they're keeping track of the my baby and nd to see if everything is ok
It's required to see your ob every two weeks until u are 36 weeks then you will see them once a week until delivery or induction I am 32 weeks and 2 days and I see my ob every 2 weeka
My midewife and doctor sees me twice a week started at 28 weeks now I'm 30 weeks , I'm 34 weeks they will see me weekly till I have the baby
I live at doctors and hospitals now! ! Only people that call me are doctors and nurses lol can't wait to have my baby!!
I am right there with you. I have to see doctor once a week and Ultra sound once a week. I am 29 weeks and just got diagnosed with Gestational Diabetes.

Yeah I'm in and out of hospitals and doctors offices more and more because of blood pressure. They are afraid its gonna spike like it did the last time four years ago and baby came early. I've only had one scare so far and put me in hospital for a week. Hopefully everything will be ok for the remainder of the pregnancy :-)

I went every 4 week's until 34 week's. Now I am every 2 week's... Until they tell me.otherwise. All doctors are different and all pregnancies are different. You haven't had any problems or.anything.to be concerned about?
Yea same here I go every two weeks now and I'm 31 weeks so its annoying but I enjoy listening to my baby heart beat and making sure he is doing well

I get ultrasound twice a week and visit  my  ob once a week so iam there 3 times a week .. Iam 35wks 5days ...ive been doing this since 32 weeks... I get to see my baby alot  thats the only fun part :)

question: My doctor has me coming in twice a week now. Seems a bit much. 32 weeks tomorrow.  Anyone else practically living in the doctors office lol?
title: Twice a week!
